page.title: 07MEANS OF TRANSPORT
page.content: The inhabitants of this block have a bus service which runs through Longburton from Sherborne to Dorchester four times daily except on Sundays. However most people find that their own transport is essential in a rural area of this type and therefore most families own at least one car and a number own two to enable the wife to travel to neighbouring larger towns for shopping, playschools and general recreation facilities. The high cost of running a car results in some people owning motorcycles and mopeds - especially young people some of whom use this means of transport to get to and from their schools when old enough. Most school children get to school by coach service (privately owned) - the majority of the children in this block go to school in Sherborne approx. 3 miles away.
